medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with antepartum hemorrhage at 29 weeks + 2 days of gestation. The symptoms were persistent and led to the delivery by emergency lower-segment caesarean section.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient was on a daily phenytoin dose of 300 mg for the last three years due to persistent seizures during the post-partum period of her previous pregnancy. No other significant medical history was mentioned.
